name: select_all_items
description: Select all items in the list view.

name: add_selected_items_to_label
description: Add the selected items to a label.
parameters: {'label_name': 'What is the name of the label you want to add the items to?'}

name: navigate_to_contact_details
description: Navigate to the details screen of a specific contact.
parameters: {'contact_name': 'Name of the contact to navigate to (e.g., Amy)'}
